caption.p: DNase I cleavage of the DNA segment containing the origin of replication OriS. Lane 1, untreated DNA fragment; lanes 2 and 8, A+G – purine sequence markers; lanes 3 and 9, cleavage products of the free DNA fragment; lanes 4–7, cleavage products in the presence of 10, 3.3, 1 and .3 μM Pt*-bis-Nt, respectively; lanes 10–13, cleavage products generated in the presence of 10, 3.3, 1 and .3 μM Pt-bis-Nt, respectively.
